welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fair Oaks, where small town charm meets big city energy! Known for its picturesque views and friendly community, we invite you to explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Fair Oaks."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses all major airlines and serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport mainly serves domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal by an underground train.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves international flights and is connected to the main terminal by an underground train.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal by an underground train.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport houses all arrival and departure gates for domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves as the gateway for all international flights.

wifi.note: Guests can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
